modName: Visky Revealing Mythic Dawn Robes For Male SAM
summary: Add two revealing Mythic Dawn robes for male that use SAM body slides.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#ffff00][size=5]Visky Revealing Mythic Dawn Robes For Male (SAM)[/size][/color]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84274-1-1496166239.jpg[/img]
[size=3][color=#ff7700]Requirements:[/color]
Skyrim
SAM


[color=#ff7700]How to get:[/color]
In console mode type "help Mythic" and get the ID for:
[color=#ffff00]Mythic Dawn Assassin's Robes [/color][color=#00ff00]（light armor with a leather-like material）[/color]
[color=#ffff00]&[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Mythic Dawn Sorcerer's Robes[/color][b][size=3][color=#00ff00]（clothing with vanilla style material）[/color][/size][/b]


[/size][/b][color=#ff7700][size=4][b]Known Issues:[/b][/size][/color][size=3]
[b]As shown in screenshots, clippings on chest armor can be quite visible when doing some specific animations.
I followed tutorial strictly, however, clippings seed to be impossible to avoid :(


[/b][/size][color=#ff7700][size=4][b]Models Used in SS:[/b][/size][/color]
[b][size=3]Ariel, Cinccino & Elliot From My Follower Mod "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84070/?]Visky Male Followers in Castle[/url]"[/size][/b]


[/center]
author: viwi
